phrs.translation: 日本人称之为, 旋转木马, 轮播图, 轮播
滑动样式与传送带, 滑动器和旋转木马
旋转木马高挂在天上, 旋转木马

sentences.sentence: Carousels are essentially slideshow navigations, in which the content rotates vertically or horizontally (hence the name "carousel").
sentences.translation: 旋转木马本质上是幻灯片导航，其中的内容垂直或水平旋转（因此得名“旋转木马”）。

sentences.sentence: Sliders, also known as carousels, are an organized, interactive and quite smooth way to present information.
sentences.translation: 滑动器，也称为旋转木马，是一种组织有序，可交互的并且可流畅表达信息的方式。滑动器是一种非常流行的技术因为确实非常实用。

sentences.sentence: Renderscript is an ideal way to create high-performance 3d effects for applications, wallpapers, carousels, and more.
sentences.translation: 渲染脚本是创建高性能的3d效果的理想选择。
